overview:
William is a tech inventor and entrepreneur from London in the United Kingdom.

He founded the the company Clever Bins after inventing a solar powered street litter bin for digital outdoor advertising. The Bins were seen on the BBCs investment show Dragons Den and currently now trades in several countries.

William is also the founder of 123-registration.com a web hosting provider which he sold to a larger player. He has also created and sold other web startups.

Currently William is working on another web startup he founded with a business partner. The startup, mycityvenue.com is a platform for clubs and venues which unifies all their marketing activates on one website creating one user experience.
